author: callierbyrnes
title: This Couple Didn’t Realize Their Motorcycle Sex Would Be Caught On Camera And WTF
text:
Driving a motorbike without some sort of protective gear is dangerous enough, but this couple stepped it up a notch on the “nope” scale: not only were they almost completely naked, but they were also caught having sex while speeding down a highway in Paraguay.
I’m not sure what possessed this man and woman to cross this one off their bucket list, but they’ve definitely gotten attention for it. Someone in a nearby car managed to capture the couple’s act of passion on camera, which has since then gone viral, because WTF.

I guess everyone gets tired of the bedroom eventually, but I’m not sure this is the route to take if you want to spice up your sex life. Can’t you at least wear a helmet, please? You’re making me anxious.
Hopefully the couple has #noregrets, since what they did was not only extremely dangerous but also very illegal. It turns out the video also garnered attention from the Paraguayan authorities, who are now investigating the couple’s identities. If caught, they could face a fine of 3 million Paraguayan Guarani, or about $540.
You can watch the full video here, though it’s NSFW, obviously.

Welp. Don’t try this at home, kids.
